CRAN check results

Source: R/info-cran.R
get_pkg_cran_check_results.Rd

Return latest CRAN check results.

get_pkg_cran_check_results(package_name)

Arguments

package_name

Name of the package.

Examples

# CRAN check results
get_pkg_cran_check_results("dplyr")
#> # A tibble: 12 x 4
#>    os                r      status url                                          
#>    <chr>             <chr>  <chr>  <chr>                                        
#>  1 linux-x86_64-deb~ devel  OK     https://www.R-project.org/nosvn/R.check/r-de~
#>  2 linux-x86_64-deb~ devel  OK     https://www.R-project.org/nosvn/R.check/r-de~
#>  3 linux-x86_64-fed~ devel  NOTE   https://www.R-project.org/nosvn/R.check/r-de~
#>  4 linux-x86_64-fed~ devel  NOTE   https://www.R-project.org/nosvn/R.check/r-de~
#>  5 windows-ix86+x86~ devel  NOTE   https://www.R-project.org/nosvn/R.check/r-de~
#>  6 linux-x86_64      patch~ OK     https://www.R-project.org/nosvn/R.check/r-pa~
#>  7 solaris-x86       patch~ NOTE   https://www.R-project.org/nosvn/R.check/r-pa~
#>  8 linux-x86_64      relea~ OK     https://www.R-project.org/nosvn/R.check/r-re~
#>  9 windows-ix86+x86~ relea~ NOTE   https://www.R-project.org/nosvn/R.check/r-re~
#> 10 osx-x86_64        relea~ NOTE   https://www.R-project.org/nosvn/R.check/r-re~
#> 11 windows-ix86+x86~ oldrel NOTE   https://www.R-project.org/nosvn/R.check/r-ol~
#> 12 osx-x86_64        oldrel NOTE   https://www.R-project.org/nosvn/R.check/r-ol~
